column1:
A new phase is open at Brittany Manor in Mt. Airy, Maryland! Avoid the stress of bidding wars on resale homes and buy a new home this Presidents’ Day, like this home designed in our gorgeous Tomasen floorplan. Our Tomasen floorplan offers spaces for the whole family, with 4 bedrooms, a versatile loft and a basement rec room space.
Explore more home design options and schedule your tour at Brittany Manor: http://khov.homes/vrLl50E1lPP
Pricing from the lower $500s. Open by appointment only. Virtual tours available.

Celebrating with a smooch! Another home sold at Sola Vista in St. Cloud, FL. This community has beautiful new homes for sale with access to a resort-style pool, cabana and children's tot lot. Follow @jorgeriverakhov on Instagram to make an appointment at Sola Vista to get in your new home today! 
See more of our Orlando communities here: 
http://khov.homes/Af5O50E1kDL

Check out our gorgeous community Galloway Ridge in Cave Creek, Arizona. This community offers new homes up to 3,507 sq. ft. located near rustic shopping centers, picturesque golf courses, and both the I-17 & 101 Loop. With a spacious pool, fire pit, dog park, and pickleball court providing entertainment for all. 
Pricing from the lower $600s.
Follow our sales consultants on Instagram:
instagram.com/ckarenreyeskhov
instagram.com/neeshawolfaz
Learn more about this community by clicking the link. Virtual tours available.
http://khov.homes/wlOI50E1jZm

Coming soon! North Hill is a community of contemporary new townhomes in Alexandria, VA. The sought-after location is 4 miles from Old Town Alexandria and 11 miles from DC adding to the appeal of this affordable new neighborhood, featuring a wide selection of townhome floorplans.
Join our VIP interest list and receive updates on this community: http://khov.homes/tGIq50E1iho

Today we are spotlighting our new Sycamore model at Villas at the Station in Sachse, Texas! The Sycamore offers an open concept kitchen and living space, 4 bedrooms, including a gorgeous owners suite with an optional luxury bath, and a spacious game room for entertaining.
Learn more about this floorplan and schedule your tour today: http://khov.homes/mKwB50E1h0V
Pricing from the lower $300s. Open by appointment only. Virtual tours available.

COMING LATE SPRING 2021! Aspire at Fork Landing is a new single-family home community in Felton, DE. Residents commuting to Bayhealth Hospital or Dover AirForce Base will enjoy being just miles from Routes 1 and 13. Start your new home journey today! 
Join our VIP interest list today here:
http://khov.homes/Wofx50E1gwz

Congrats to this family for joining the Coral Lago in Coral Spring, FL neighborhood! We are excited about your new chapter!   taken by sales consultant @vanessaskhov.
Click the link to learn more about Coral Lago.

Our Feature Friday this week is our Lantana community in Bakersfield, California! This gorgeous community offers 3 designs of affordable single family new homes up to 2,080 sq. ft., up to 5 bedrooms and 3 baths! Enjoy a relaxed lifestyle only a few miles away from California State Route 178.
?????????
Pricing from the lower $300s.
Click the link to schedule a tour or FaceTime appointment with our Sales Consultants! Virtual tours available. http://khov.homes/6Lk850DD5hD

Two Quick Move-In Townhomes are currently selling at Enclave at Waugh Chapel in Gambrills, Maryland. Residents reap the rewards of this community’s convenient location, less than 20 miles away from Baltimore and Annapolis and centrally located to Fort Meade and other Maryland military bases. Pricing from the lower $500s. Open by appointment only. Virtual tours available.
Schedule your tour of the available townhomes today: http://khov.homes/2QPP50DD5rM

Meadow Lakes located in North Ridgeville, Ohio. Meadow Lakes offers single family new homes designed for modern living.
Pricing starts in the lower $200s at Meadow Lakes. Tour one of our homes today by scheduling an appointment with a Sales Consultant, click the link: http://khov.homes/ka1k50Da1WT
